abstract: A report in The Times of London on Sunday that Microsoft is in talks with Yahoo to buy the U.S. internet company’s online search business for $20 billion is “total fiction,” a key executive told AllThingsDigital.
lead_paragraph: A report in The Times of London on Sunday that Microsoft is in talks with Yahoo to buy the U.S. internet company’s online search business for $20 billion is “total fiction,” a key executive told AllThingsDigital.

abstract: In a new book, Microsoft veteran Keith Curtis argues that open source is the future of software and his former employer is “toast.”
snippet: In a new book, Microsoft veteran Keith Curtis argues that open source is the future of software and his former employer is “toast.”
lead_paragraph: Keith Curtis has just written a book about the future of software.

headline.main: A Microsoft Veteran Embraces Open Source
